dmca.title: Scientology claims copyright and trademark infringement
dmca.body:
Dear [private]

Please be advised that our office has been retained to represent Religious Technology Center ("RTC"), Church of Scientology International ("CSI") and the L. Ron Hubbard Library, regarding trademark and copyright infringement that is occurring on a number of your Internet websites.  

I. Trademark Infringement.
 
 

The file of this matter reveals that you have previously been apprised that RTC is the owner of the trademarks of the Scientology religion, which includes the following trademarks and service marks:

1.
dmca.sender_name: Davis Collison Cave Solicitors Pty Ltd
dmca.principal_name: Religious Technology Center ("RTC"), Church of Scientology International ("CSI") and
